titles.title: Veterans and Survivors Dental Insurance Act of 2008
To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide a dental insurance plan for certain veterans and their survivors and dependents.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1237-1238)
Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
6/17/2008--Introduced.
Veterans and Survivors Dental Insurance Act of 2008 - Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide a dental insurance plan for any veteran enrolled in the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) annual patient enrollment system, as well as their survivors and dependents. Provides for: (1) the payment of premiums for plan enrollment; and (2) voluntary plan disenrollment.
